spell.name: Concealed Shot (Barrage)
entries: The next time you make an attack with a ranged weapon during this spell's duration, the shot is concealed. The attack's projectile is {@condition invisible} while in flight and the weapon itself is silent. If the weapon is a firearm, this spell suppresses the smoke and light the weapon produces, making it impossible to see or hear where the shot came from.
The spell conceals more than one shot when you reach higher levels: two shots at 5th level, three shots at 11th level, and four shots at 17th level.
